text: Nicholas "Nichi" Vendola (born 26 August 1958 in Bari) is an Italian politician. He is the leader of the political party Left Ecology Freedom (Sinistra Ecologia Libert√†). ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Apulia Category:People from Bari Category:1958 births
